thread.section_title: McMaster-Carr Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McMaster-Carr | www.mcmaster.com
thread.title: Joseph Koch

author: Joseph Koch
title: Joseph Koch
text: I order from McMaster-Carr on a regular basis. I do not believe you will find another company that does "it" as well as them. They are the standard that all other companies strive to achieve. Website works well, ordering is a breeze, excellent customer service, ship extremely fast and cheap, billing is quick and accurate, products are as described. Will always order from McMaster given the choice. Only exception is having to watch for items that will go truck freight as that is not always apparent when ordering. Love doing business with this place.
